title.narrative: Start Network, Strengthen and support to DRF system in Pakistan

description.narrative:
The project will be run by START network through TWG and and local organizations, as START network response depending on emergency situation in Pakistan and following would be the expected beneficiaries based on emergency project/call:
Targeting approximately 1000 HH (for each emergency response) Local NGO (for each emergency minimum 2 organizations) Technical working groups (drought, flood and heatwave)
The number of beneficiaries will increase or decrease based on the nature of emergency / need

WHH response objectives are to:
overall development, agreement, and management of workplans, protocols, budgets and coordination structures to ensure that activities are happening as required for the set up of a national DRF system. Coordinate a number of different stakeholders including NGOs, Government counterparts, consultants and local civil society to ensure that the right stakeholders are able to support different parts of the project. When funding is triggered and released, the hub will monitor and support the implementation of pre-agreed standard operating procedures, convene project selection meetings and ensure that operations are delivered in a timely manner with humanitarian principles applied throughout.
